author: Albert Einstein
message: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
title: Thought of the day

author: Colette
message: I love my past. I love my present. I'm not ashamed of what Ive had, and I'm not sad because I have it no longer.
title: Thought of the day

author: Maya Angelou
message: Prejudice is a burden that confuses the past, threatens the future and renders the present inaccessible.
title: Thought of the day

author: William Hazlitt
message: Just as much as we see in others we have in ourselves.
title: Thought of the day
